// id: Unique identifier for the form (required, lowercase with hyphens)

// instructions: Initial instructions shown at the beginning of form (optional)

title: Comprehensive Form Template - All Question Types
description: This template demonstrates all available question types with configuration options
instructions:
This form showcases every question type available in the system.

Please review each question type and its configuration options.

Note: This is a template for demonstration purposes.
welcome_message: Welcome! This form demonstrates all available question types.
closing_message: Thank you for reviewing this comprehensive template!

settings.confidentialityNotice: Your responses are confidential and will be aggregated.

// Feature Flags.// placeholder: Hint text shown in empty inputs
// Feature Flags.// charLimit: Maximum character count for text inputs
